SEARCH
Module JBubbleBobble
Package game.model.level

Class LevelLoader

java.lang.Object
game.model.level.LevelLoader
public class LevelLoader extends Object
The LevelLoader class is responsible for loading level data from files and creating objects such as tiles and enemies based on the level's layout. It reads level files and converts the data into game objects that populate the game level.

    loadLevel(Level level, int levelNum)

    Reads the level file for the specified level number and returns a 2D character array representing the layout of the level.

  • Method Details

    • readLevelFile

      public static char[][] readLevelFile(int levelNum)
      Reads the level file for the specified level number and returns a 2D character array representing the layout of the level.
      Parameters:
      levelNum - The number of the level to be loaded.
      Returns:
      A 2D character array representing the level's layout.

    • loadLevel

      public static char[][] loadLevel(Level level, int levelNum)
      Loads a level from the specified level file and creates the necessary objects (tiles, player spawn point, enemies) based on the level layout. The layout is determined by reading a level file and parsing the characters to create appropriate objects.
      Parameters:
      level - The Level object to populate with game entities.
      levelNum - The number of the level to be loaded.
      Returns:
      A 2D character array representing the level's layout.
